column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Now while we were here our waiter mentioned their new years day party.  It's a pajama party!!! And as long as you do show up in pj's
column2: whatever you spend on food and drink
column3: you get back in the form of gift cards when you leave- for use at a later time.  So we basically got 2 meals for the price of one!! AWESOME!  AND
column4: since we got to eat in our pjs (aka stretchy pants) we managed to eat a LOT and thus we got a big ole gift card for our next visit!! I LOVE it!!!!
